question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the tech industry and identify trends in their posting strategies over the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies within the tech industry and gather their basic information such as name, industry, and engagement metrics from social media platforms.
Aggregate and analyze social media engagement data (likes, comments, shares) for the identified tech companies across various platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube).
Examine posting frequency, content themes, and engagement rates from the social media details to identify successful strategies. Include trends observed over the last year.
Compile a report summarizing the insights and trends in posting strategies, highlighting companies with the highest engagement in the tech sector.
